head.title: Aunt Nellie's Sour Cream Raisin Pie

directions.step:
Pour boiling water over raisins and let stand 15-20 minutes. Pour off. Pour sugar and cinnamon over raisins. Mix well. Add eggs and sour cream.
Pour into bottom crust and make a lattice top crust. Bake for 15 minutes at 375F or until crust is brown.
From: Pat's Great-Aunt Nellie's recipe collection (1992) Posted to MM-Recipes Digest V3 #238
Date: Sat, 31 Aug 1996 22:00:39 -0500
From: pickell@cyberspc.mb.ca (S.Pickell)
